Document:
# Nanotrasen The orion arm leviathan of a mining company with their names on anything to do with plasma. NT currently holds a majority stake in the starship fuel market, and is by far the wealthiest company in known space. There's not a lot that NT hasn't dipped their toes into with varying degrees of success. They're one of the very few corporations capable of funding their own private navy.
# Epsilon Eradani A rapidly developing system within the frontier. While NT remains very interested in the frontier a sa whole most of their effort seems to be concentrated around this one star system.
